name: Autumn League Pullover
description: Update: As of 10/5/22, this pattern has been updated to include 8 sizes and now features an in-the-round construction.
suggested_yarn: Lion Brand LB Collection Cotton Jeans
full_text: Update: As of 10/5/22, this pattern has been updated to include 8 sizes and now features an in-the-round construction. A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here. The Autumn League Pullover is a crewneck raglan sweater that evokes memories of Friday night football games, crisp fall evenings, and a general sense of nostalgia. The doubled ribbed neckband, v-insert neck triangle, and side slit details give personality and add to the classic appeal of this sweatshirt-inspired wardrobe staple. Meant to be well-loved and well-worn, this sweater has the perfect broken-in relaxed fit and deep raglans that allow for chic comfort and wearable ease. Shop the full kit here. SIZES XS (S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL) Suggested positive ease: 4-8”/10-20.5cm Pictured in size S on model with 34”/86.5cm bust FINISHED DIMENSIONS Body/bust circumference: 36.25 (40.5, 43.75, 48, 52.25, 56.5, 59.75, 64)”/92 (103, 111, 122, 132.5, 143.5, 152, 162.5)cm Length: 23 (23.25, 24, 24.25, 25, 25.75, 26, 26.5)”/58.5 (59, 61, 61.5, 63.5, 65.5, 66, 68)cm Sleeve Length: 18”/46cm DIFFICULTY LEVEL Intermediate SKILLS Knitting and purling M1l and m1r increases Traveling stitches Working flat and in the round K2tog and SSK decreases Picking up and knitting stitches Tubular bind off Mattress stitch All patterns are written in standard US terms. Sign up for info on special offers, sales, and new pattern releases: bit.ly/TOWnewsletter CONNECT Instagram: @twoofwands Facebook: facebook.com/twoofwands Pinterest: pinterest.com/twoofwandsknits Youtube: youtube.com/twoofwandsknits HELP Join the Crew of Wands Facebook group to connect with other makers of Two of Wands patterns for help with techniques and pattern related questions.
